title: # 315 - Fortune Feimster & ME
description:
I sit down in the man cave with Fortune Feimster to talk about growing up in North Carolina, her family, Sober October, Acting, auditioning for SNL, Chelsea Handler, Last Comic Standing, Coming out, and much more!

This episode is brought to you by Butcher Box. Order now and get free bacon for life plus $20 off of your first box at www.Butcherbox.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This podcast is also brought to you by Noom. Start your trial today and start losing weight for good at www.noom.com/bertcast 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!
For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
